<p>
 MY DEAR SIR:
</p><p>
Looking over my stores, I find a box of Guava marmalade which, perhaps, the physician may not consider improper to make part of the diet of your sick companion.
</p><p>
Yours very truly,
</p><p>
<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=wfs" rel="me">WINFIELD SCOTT</a>
</p><p>
GEN'L. P. F. SMITH, 
</p>
